sentences.en: Shall I meet you after school today?
sentences.cn: 今天放学后我去找你好吗？

sentences.en: After school, we used to chill out in each others' bedrooms.
sentences.cn: 放学后，我们常常到彼此的卧室里放松休息。

sentences.en: After school, I had picked up Nick and Ted and made the rounds of the dry cleaner and the food stores.
sentences.cn: 放学后，我接了尼克和特德,然后去了那干洗店和食品店。
